subject: [cc-community] A Swarm of Angels media release form template
body:
I am commencing a gather of video footage for the user-generated 
documentary to accompany the A Swarm of Angels open movie project ( 
http://www.aswarmofangels.com/ ).

I am finalising a release form for members to include as part of their 
uploaded media to the project. This is not a public submission so I 
don't foresee any problems regarding permissions with the media, but I 
would like it covered legally for the project, and to also to reassure, 
and ensure the rights of, uploaders.

I'd welcome comment on this text to its adequacy etc, and any 
suggestions for modification.

"A Swarm of Angels media release form

Date:

Name:
Forum name:

I wish to be credited as:

By uploading this file I hereby give permission irrevocably and 
unconditionally for this media to be used as part of the A Swarm of 
Angels project without condition other than to receive correct 
attribution under the Creative Commons license set out below.

The uploaded media contains no other copyrighted materials, including 
music and images, that I am not entitled to give permission for use. I 
assign permission for my likeness to be used in A Swarm of Angels 
project materials, including, but not limited to, documentary video, 
DVD, video podcast, printed & promotional materials.

I understand this is a non-exclusive license and my fair dealing and 
other rights are in no way affected.

This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 
License. To view a copy of this license, visit 
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ or send a letter to 
Creative Commons, 171 Second Street, Suite 300, San Francisco, 
California, 94105, USA."

For those unfamiliar with the project, a quick note to reiterate that 
all media associated with this feature film project will be released 
under a CC license.

Thanks,

Matt

//  Matt Hanson / Director
//  A Swarm of Angels. Remixing cinema
//  http://www.aswarmofangels.com
